organizations: Travel Agent Academy Announces Catalonia & Barcelona

thread.title: Travel Agent Academy Announces Catalonia & Barcelona Specialist Courses
thread.title_full: Travel Agent Academy Announces Catalonia & Barcelona Specialist Courses

title: Travel Agent Academy Announces Catalonia & Barcelona Specialist Courses
text:
Last updated: 12:50 PM ET, Wed August 12 2015 Travel Agent Academy Announces Catalonia & Barcelona Specialist Courses Travel Agent | Courtney Love | August 12, 2015 
Photo by David Cogswell 
Travel Agent Academy is excited to announce its latest course offering: the Catalonia & Barcelona Specialist program. This program was created to educate travel agents on one of the most popular tourist regions of Spain. Catalonia is known for its beautiful beaches and resorts, mountain scenery, world-class gastronomy, architecture, World Heritage Sites, its capital, Barcelona and more.
